did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Letters, legal records, and news clippings.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Clippings, engineering reports, letters, financial records, legal records, travel notes, and articles of Ross L. Baker.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Ross L. Baker was an inventor and an engineer. He organized R. L. Baker and Co. Engineers, a firm of consulting engineers in New York City. Cornell University Class of 1907.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Clippings, engineering reports, letters, financial records, legal records, travel notes, and articles of Ross L. Baker

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Ross Lee Baker Papers, #3629. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
